and Google WorkspaceBox Mobile App CollaborationIntegrated desktop experienceShared folders and linksBox Community accessOnline/self-paced trainingOur extensive Box Education libraryNote-taking and project managementEasy ways to collaborate in real timeShow more featuresShow less featuresTrusted by the world's leading organizationsUsing Box for work?
We’ve got you covered.Check out our Business plans: the fastest way to get your whole team collaborating securely. You get all the features in the plans above, plus unlimited external collaborators, unlimited storage, unlimited web-based e-signatures, and 1,500+ enterprise app integrations. You also get data loss protection, custom branding, document watermarking, and Admin Console access. The best part? Our plans won’t break the bank.
View Business plans Explore how the Content Cloud worksFrequently asked questionsHow much data can 10GB hold?The average user stores a mix of digital media (photos and videos) and documents. 10GB gives you the option of storing roughly:2,000 songs or picturesMore than 50,000 documentsCan I share my files and folders with someone who doesn’t have a Box account?Yes! You can create an external link that can be shared with anyone, even people without a Box account. (Though while you’re at it, why not encourage them to start a free Box account?! That way you can collaborate with them and co-edit the document.)Can I buy more storage space on my plan?If you have an Individual plan, you can free up space by deleting unused files and folders, or you can choose an upgraded plan (with unlimited storage available) that meets your needs.Can I access my Box account via mobile?Absolutely! Download the Box Mobile App here to access your content anywhere, anytime.Have another question?Check out our help center.Need help finding the right solution? Start by contacting our sales team. Tell us what you're hoping to accomplish with Box and how we can help simplify the way your organization works.Business$20 $15
